titles.title: A resolution recognizing the Weatherization Assistance Program during its 40th anniversary year for its history of reducing the energy costs of families with low incomes, making low-income households healthier and safer, positively impacting the environment, and supporting jobs and new technology.

A resolution recognizing the Weatherization Assistance Program during its 40th anniversary year for its history of reducing the energy costs of families with low incomes, making low-income households healthier and safer, positively impacting the environment, and supporting jobs and new technology.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Energy assistance for the poor and aged

bill.summary:
Recognizes the Weatherization Assistance Program for 40 years of reducing the energy burden on low-income families, positively impacting the environment, and supporting jobs and newtechnology.
Encourages the Weatherization Assistance Program to continue performing essential weatherization services in the future.
Applaudsthe dedicated professionals at the federal, state, and local levels who run the daily operations of the Weatherization Assistance Program.
